Package de.dhbw.ravensburg.zuul.room

Class Room

java.lang.Object
de.dhbw.ravensburg.zuul.room.Room
Direct Known Subclasses:
Beach, Forest, Ruin
public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
Class Room - a room in an adventure game. This class is part of the "World of Zuul" application. "World of Zuul" is a very simple, text based adventure game. A "Room" represents one location in the scenery of the game. It is connected to other rooms via exits. For each existing exit, the room stores a reference to the neighboring room.
Version:
1.1
Author:
Michael KÃ¶lling, David J. Barnes and Frederik Dammeier

  • Constructor Details

    • Room

      public Room​(java.lang.String description, Item... specialItems)
      Create a room described "description". Initially, it has no exits. "description" is something like "a kitchen" or "an open court yard". May add "Items" to the room.
      Parameters:
      description - The room's description.
      specialItems - Items to add to the rooms inventory.

    • Room

      public Room​(java.lang.String description, Creature creature, Item... specialItems)
      Create a room described "description". Initially, it has no exits. "description" is something like "a kitchen" or "an open court yard". Adds a "Creature" to the room. May add "Items" to the room.
      Parameters:
      description - The room's description.
      creature - Creature to add to the room.
      specialItems - Items to add to the room.

    • Room

      public Room​(java.lang.String description, Creature creature, RoomType type, Item... specialItems)
      Create a room described "description". Initially, it has no exits. "description" is something like "a kitchen" or "an open court yard". Adds a "Creature" to the room. Assigns the room a type to be recognized by the UI. May add "Items" to the room.
      Parameters:
      description - The room's description.
      creature - Creature to add to the room.
      type - Type of the room.
      specialItems - Items to add to the room.

  • Method Details

    • setExit

      public void setExit​(java.lang.String direction, Room neighbor)
      Define an exit from this room.
      Parameters:
      direction - The direction of the exit.
      neighbor - The room to which the exit leads.

    • getShortDescription

      public java.lang.String getShortDescription()
      Returns:
      The short description of the room (the one that was defined in the constructor).

    • getLongDescription

      public java.lang.String getLongDescription()
      Return a description of the room in the form: You are in the kitchen. Exits: north west
      Returns:
      A long description of this room

    • getExit

      public Room getExit​(java.lang.String direction)
      Return the room that is reached if we go from this room in direction "direction". If there is no room in that direction, return null.
      Parameters:
      direction - The exit's direction.
      Returns:
      The room in the given direction.

    • getCreature

      public Creature getCreature()
      Getter for creature in the room.
      Returns:

    • setCreature

      public void setCreature​(Creature creature)
      Replaces creature in room with the given Creature.
      Parameters:
      creature - null to remove the rooms creature.

    • getInventory

      public Inventory getInventory()
      A reference to the rooms inventory instance.
      Returns:
      The rooms inventory instance.
